dialogue.describe: You seem to understand this Xenoid threat better than most…
dialogue.offer: You're kitted out better than most… would you be interested in making this world a little better for the rest of us?  The towns have enough supplies for us survivors to start securing a foothold but we don't have anyone with the skills and equipment to thin the masses of undead.  I'll lend you a hand to the best of my ability but you really showed promise taking out that other beast.  You, I, and a 100 zombies laid to rest, what do you say?
dialogue.accepted: Hell ya, we may get ourselves killed but we'll be among the first legends of the apocalypse.
dialogue.rejected: Hey, I know I wouldn't volunteer for it either… but then I remember that most of us survivors won't make it unless someone decides to take the initiative.
dialogue.advice: I'd secure an ammo cache and try to sweep a town in multiple passes.
dialogue.success: Man… you're a goddamn machine.  It was a pleasure working with you.  You know, you may just change our little neck of the world if you keep this up.
dialogue.success_lie: I don't think that was quite a hundred dead strays.

dialogue.describe: You seem to understand this Xenoid threat better than most…
dialogue.offer: You're kitted out better than most… would you be interested in making this world a little better for the rest of humanity?  The towns have enough supplies for us survivors to start securing a foothold but we don't have anyone with the skills and equipment to thin the ranks of the Xenoid Infantry.  Head out on patrol and exterminate at least a dozen Xenoid robots, what do you say?
dialogue.accepted: Great, this will really help establish the perimeter around Barter Tower.
dialogue.rejected: Hey, I know I wouldn't volunteer for it either… but then I remember that most of us survivors won't make it unless someone decides to take the initiative.
dialogue.advice: I'd secure an ammo cache and try to sweep an area in multiple passes.
dialogue.success: Man… you're a goddamn machine.  You know, you may just change our little neck of the world if you keep this up.
dialogue.success_lie: I don't think that was quite a dozen xenoid robots.

dialogue.describe: You seem to understand this Xenoid threat better than most…
dialogue.offer: You've killed a few of the alien robots so far, how about going and making it an even one hundred.
dialogue.accepted: Hell ya, we may get ourselves killed but we'll be among the first legends of the apocalypse.
dialogue.rejected: Hey, I know I wouldn't volunteer for it either… but then I remember that most of us survivors won't make it unless someone decides to take the initiative.
dialogue.advice: I'd secure an ammo cache and try to sweep a town in multiple passes.
dialogue.success: Man… you're a goddamn machine.  It was a pleasure working with you.  You know, you may just change our little neck of the world if you keep this up.
dialogue.success_lie: I don't think that was quite a hundred dead strays.

description: Find the latest MathMAX firmware patch for

dialogue.describe: I need you to find me something.
dialogue.offer: I use a software package called MathMAX for my ongoing research, but I need a few add-ons to optimize the workflow.  Find me a USB drive that contains an update.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  The USB drive should display the contents as 'MathMAX'.
dialogue.rejected: Oh well.  I'll see if someone else can find it, thanks.
dialogue.advice: The best place would probably be a goverment research lab, but then again things like this seem to end up in the trash all the time.  Just keep your eyes open for a USB drive that displays the content as 'MathMAX'.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I wonder where it all went…

dialogue.describe: I'd like to read some erotic novels.
dialogue.offer: Hmm, that would be great!  But if you do, please bring more than just one.  I could read a single novel in a day.  Could you get me… 3 erotic novels?
dialogue.accepted: Just bring it to me when you have it.
dialogue.rejected: Nevermind then.  I hope you'll change your mind.
dialogue.inquire: So, have you found the books?
dialogue.success: Thank you.  This will keep me busy for a while.  Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
dialogue.success_lie: Could you give them to me?
dialogue.failure: Fine.  I can read something else.

name.str: Got to have my favorite cola.

description: Find six cans of the best energy cola that ever existed.

dialogue.describe: I need you to find me something.
dialogue.offer: Ever since I turned into a insect mutant, I've been wanting to have few more cans of my favorite energy cola, it was like a clear morning dew. I even have some of the new money for your troubles.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  They won't be making this anymore.
dialogue.rejected: Oh well.  I'll see if I can find another supplier, thanks.
dialogue.advice: There are probably a lot of cans around in vending machines.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I wonder where it all went…

description: Find six quarts of new motor oil in exchange for <reward_count:FMCNote> certified notes.

dialogue.describe: I need you to find me something.
dialogue.offer: I'm working on getting an old truck running, but I need a good six quarts of new motor oil to get it up and running again.  I even have some of the new money for your troubles.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  Motor oil is getting very hard to come by anymore.
dialogue.rejected: Oh well.  I'll see if I can find another supplier, thanks.
dialogue.advice: A gas station, house garage, there's plenty of places to look.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I wonder where it all went…

description: Find a few packs of playing cards.

dialogue.describe: I'd like a few packs of playing cards.
dialogue.offer: I really like tossing a card up in the air and shooting holes in it before it hits the ground, and its fun to play solitaire between watches.  Could you find me a few packs of playing cards?
dialogue.accepted: Just bring it to me when you have it.
dialogue.rejected: Nevermind then.  I hope you'll change your mind.
dialogue.inquire: So, have you found the books?
dialogue.success: Thank you.  This will keep me busy for a while.  Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
dialogue.success_lie: Could you give them to me?
dialogue.failure: Fine.  I can read something else.

description: Find a few packs of Sorcery cards.

dialogue.describe: I'd like a few packs of Sorcery cards.
dialogue.offer: I really miss playing Sorcery Solitaire, it was a magical gathering back in the day.  Could you find me a few packs of Sorcery cards?
dialogue.accepted: Just bring it to me when you have it.
dialogue.rejected: Nevermind then.  I hope you'll change your mind.
dialogue.inquire: So, have you found the books?
dialogue.success: Thank you.  This will keep me busy for a while.  Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
dialogue.success_lie: Could you give them to me?
dialogue.failure: Fine.  I can read something else.

description: Find the latest hackPRO exploits and hacks

dialogue.describe: I need you to find me something.
dialogue.offer: I need to be on the look out for a 'hackPRO' update, it helps with work-arounds on electronics that need repair.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  The USB drive should display the contents as 'hackPRO'.
dialogue.rejected: Oh well.  I'll see if someone else can find it, thanks.
dialogue.advice: The best place would probably be a goverment research lab, but then again things like this seem to end up in the trash all the time.  Just keep your eyes open for a USB drive that displays the content as 'hackPRO'.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I wonder where it all went…

name.str: A swage and die set of what?

description: Find a swage and die set.

dialogue.describe: I need you to find me something.
dialogue.offer: A swage and die set is used for testing higher mechanical tolerances and intricate fabrication, this would be extremely useful with repairs and maintance of everything in the building.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  This will really help out the resistance organization.
dialogue.rejected: Oh well.  I'll see if I can find another supplier, thanks.
dialogue.advice: A steel factory or lumbermill might have one, maybe even a stray or a zombie with a toolbelt?
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I wonder where it all went…

dialogue.describe: I have a heist for you…
dialogue.offer: My great-great-great-great-grandfather's civil war sabre is wasting way in a museum.  Now that no one is guarding it I want to recover it.
dialogue.rejected: I will wait, and perhaps someone else will help me.
dialogue.advice: Just bust though the door, break the glass and grab it.  Stealth is not required for this mission.
dialogue.success: I knew you could find it.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do me?

dialogue.describe: I need you to find a cat.
dialogue.offer: The last time I was out on patrol, I saw some weird cats out by a large park, their fur looked like it was shifting colors, like an iridescent beetle.  However, I was wounded and had to return quickly and sadly wasn't able to find the cat, would you care to investigate it for me please uWu?
dialogue.accepted: Thank you!  I don't have anything to catch the cat with, but you could probably find a pet carrier, maybe even build a chicken cage and use that?
dialogue.rejected: Oh well, I'm sure a random mutant cat will survive the cataclysm.
dialogue.advice: A cat must be friendly to you in order to accept going into confinement.  If you're having problems catching the cat, try befriending it with food.
dialogue.success: Thank you so much!  This cat is going to be named Lucky because she is the luckiest cat to be alive, especially considering she is pregnant.
dialogue.success_lie: What?!  You're lying, I can tell!  Did you even bring a cage?
dialogue.failure: Oh no!  I guess they are too much for you…

dialogue.describe: I need you to find me something.
dialogue.offer: I need a working autoclave to sterilize bionics before installing them.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  This will really help out the resistance organization.
dialogue.rejected: Oh well.  I'll see if I can find another supplier, thanks.
dialogue.advice: A hospital might have one, or maybe a secret lab?
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I wonder where it all went…

description: Find the latest MediSoft firmware patch

dialogue.describe: I need you to find me something.
dialogue.offer: I need to check the autodoc for updates, find me the latest MediSoft firmware patch.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  The USB drive should display the contents as 'MediSoft'.
dialogue.rejected: Oh well.  I'll see if someone else can find it, thanks.

dialogue.failure: I wonder where it all went…

dialogue.offer: Ever since I turned into a beast mutant, I've been wanting to have few more cans of my favorite energy cola, it was like a clear morning dew. I even have some of the new money for your troubles.
